Content:: The Journal of Comparative Physiology B: Biochemical, Systemic, and Environmental Physiology is a monthly peer-reviewed scientific journal of comparative physiology. It was established in 1984, when it was split off from the Journal of Comparative Physiology. The editor-in-chief is Gerhard Heldmaier (Universit√§t Marburg). The journal become electronic only in 2017. The journal is indexed and abstracted in the following bibliographic databases:[1] According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 2.517.[2]
Title: Journal of Comparative Physiology B - Wikipedia
